content: this crochet donkey pattern is just the right size for bringing on adventures this is a beginner-friendly project with limited sewing this pattern was designed for the toy box crochet along with cal central crochet 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing joining with whipstitch seam changing colors in single_crochet crocheting in the front loop includes video tutorials crocheting in back loop magic magic_ring embellishing with embroidery braiding includes links to video tutorials special stitch pattern invdec includes written instruction and link to video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** approximately 6 5 16 5 cm tall after stuffing from top of head to feet approximately 8 20 5 cm tall after stuffing from tip of ears to feet **materials** lion brand feels like butta yarn 100% polyester 3 5 oz/100 g 218 yd/199 m 1 skein each in 129ae pale grey ca and 150d charcoal cb *or approximately 25 yd 23 m in ca and 80 yd 73 m in cb in any medium weight polyester yarn* us size e-4/3 5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* yarn needle locking stitch markers 8 mm black safety eyes 1 pair fiber filling **gauge** *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern stitches should be small so fiber filling doesn t show through * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/03/03/2025-toy-box-crochet-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/04/28/crochet-donkey-pattern-bernardo-burro/
